headline: BofA sees a number of AI-related risks that could challenge rally in EU stocks
summary: Investing.com – The era of easy gains in AI-related stocks might finally be over. While investors spent the last year pricing the AI revolution as an "upside-only" win for corporate profits, a new BofA Global Research note suggests the market is starting to wake up to the "double-edged sword" nature of the technology.

content.title: BofA sees a number of AI-related risks that could challenge rally in EU stocks
